page.title: 15CLUBS _PERRANPORTH BROWNIES
page.content: Every Tuesday the Perranporth Brownies meet.It starts at 4.30p.m.Our Brown Owl is Mrs Ettinger.Tawny Owl is Mrs Seaton.A girl called Fiona helps with the activities.There are 24 Brownies in our pack aged between 7 and 11 years.It is the 75th anniversary of the Brownie Movement in 1985.We have had many special events including a Flora Dance. We play lots of games at Brownies,I will tell you about one."Winker"_All the Brownies get in a circle,while one person goes outside.One of the circle is chosen as the winker.The person outside comes in and has to find out who is doing the winking.As a person is winked at she pretends to be dead. We also play "Family Car","Traffic Lights"and others.
